name: ArcheAge - Erenor Eternal Starter Pack
detailed_description:
Discover the power of the ancients and forge your own legend with this new pack! Get the ferocious Mirage Snowlion mount, the cunning Moonsand Fox pet, and more!

Mirage Snowlion Mount

  • Mount up and run wild with this vicious mount.

Moonsand Fox Pet

  • Don’t let looks fool you: try to pet this little fox and you’ll lose a hand.

30 Days of Patron

  • Grants 20% more EXP, work 20% faster, own land, and more!

Bound Tax Certificates (50x)

  • Use to pay taxes on land.

Bound Vocation Tonics (5x)

  • Increase XP gained from Labor use for one hour.

Bound Vocation Expertise Tonic (5x)

  • Decrease production time and increase Vocation Badge gain for one hour.

  • OS: Windows Vista SP1, Win7 SP1, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Must have at least 1024MB video memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Glyph client and registered Trion Worlds account
